tuv.seg: Fostering and cohabiting couples
Altramú agus lánúineacha comhchónaithe
When a child needs care or protection, or when they cannot live with their own family either on a short-term or long-term basis, they may be taken into care by the Child and Family Agency (Tusla)

Nuair a theastaíonn cúram nó cosaint ó leanbh, nó nuair nach féidir leo cónaí lena dteaghlach féin ar bhonn gearrthéarmach nó fadtéarmach, féadfaidh an Ghníomhaireacht um Leanaí agus an Teaghlach (Tusla) iad a thógáil isteach faoi chúram
The reason for taking a child into care could be illness in the family, the death of a parent, neglect, abuse or violence in the home
D’fhéadfadh breoiteacht sa teaghlach, bás tuismitheora, faillí, drochíde a imirt nó foréigean sa bhaile bheith ina chúis leis an leanbh a thógáil isteach faoi chúram
Sometimes, it could be an economic reason, like unemployment
Corruair, d’fhéadfadh cúis gheilleagrach bheith leis, ar nós dífhostaíochta
Tusla will decide on the type of care that the child should be given, having regard to the "best interests" of the child
Déanfaidh Tusla cinneadh ar an saghas cúraim ar cheart tabhairt don leanbh, agus aird ar “leas is fearr” an linbh
One of the options available to Tusla is to place the child with a foster parent or foster family
Ceann de na roghanna atá ar fáil do Tusla ná an leanbh a thabhairt do thuismitheoir altrama nó do theaghlach altrama
A foster parent is a person who is taking care of the child on behalf of Tusla
Duine atá i gceist le tuismitheoir altrama a thugann aire don leanbh ar son Tusla
Young people up to the age of 18 can be fostered
Féadtar daoine óga a fhad le 18 mbliana d’aois a altramú
Any person or family can apply to Tusla to be assessed as a foster parent or foster family
Féadfaidh aon duine nó teaghlach iarratas a dhéanamh ar Tusla go ndéanfar measúnú orthu mar thuismitheoir nó mar theaghlach altrama
You do not have to be married to be a foster parent
Ní gá duit bheith pósta chun bheith i do thuismitheoir
In fact, you could be a single person, a cohabiting same-sex or opposite sex couple or a civil partnership
D'fhéadfá fiú bheith mar dhuine singil, lánúin chomhchónaithe nó chomhghnéis nó páirtnéirí sibhialta
You must be able to provide adequate and appropriate accommodation for the foster child
Ní mór go mbeifeá in ann cóiríocht leordhóthanach agus oiriúnach a chur ar fáil don leanbh altrama
There is a shortage of foster parents and new applications and enquiries are always welcome
Táimid ar an ngannchuid i dtaobh tuismitheoirí altrama agus fáiltítear i gcónaí iarratais nua agus fiosrúcháin
Tusla assigns a social worker to carry out an assessment of your suitability
Déanann Tusla oibreoir sóisialta a shannadh le tabhairt faoi mheasúnú ar d’oiriúnacht
These assessments include meeting all members of the family (particularly the foster parents) over a number of months
Áirítear leis na measúnuithe seo casadh le gach duine den teaghlach (go háirithe na tuismitheoirí altrama) thar cúpla mí
References, Garda clearance and medical examinations will also be required as part of this process
Ina theannta sin, teastóidh teistiméireachtaí, imréiteach slándála an Gharda Síochána mar chuid den phróiseas seo
Every effort is made to ensure that those selected as foster carers and foster families are suitable
Déantar gach iarracht lena chinntiú go bhfuil iad siúd a roghnaítear bheith ina gcúramóirí altrama oiriúnach
You can read more detailed information about the types of foster care, rules, etc
Féadfaidh tú faisnéis níos sonraí a léamh faoi na saghsanna cúram altrama, rialacha, etc
in our document on fostering in Ireland
inár ndoiciméad maidir le haltramú in Éirinn
